credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
title: Plan of an imaginary ancient seat of learning
description:
Vertical rectangle. Plan of a large circular structure with radiating crilces and pavilions. Description, upper left; key, upper right. Inscribed, lower left: "Giambattista Piranesi inventore scolpi." Plate 22 of the "Opere varie di architettura prospettive ---"

Focillon, vol.    II, P. 18, nO. 121 (22). Reprint
name: Print
